mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_IN_DETAIL_LAND (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
ass_in_no ,
ass_id ,
ass_no ,
in_amount ,
price ,
note ,
reg_no ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_in_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{ass_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{in_amount,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{price,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{reg_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
)
mapper.select: SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, ass_in_no, ass_id, ass_no, in_amount, price, note, reg_no FROM ass_in_detail_land WHERE group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ass_in_no = #{ass_in_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ass_id = #{ass_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ass_no = #{ass_no,jdbcType=INTEGER}
